title: Cognitive Theory-Driven Multimedia Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (fractions, geometry, measurement)
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining digital devices with traditional classroom activities, applying mathematical concepts to understand scientific systems.

learning_goals: Learners can explain geometric transformation principles (rotation, symmetry) with 80% accuracy through animations and voiceover explanations
Learners can mathematically model real-world problems (e.g., bicycle tire pressure calculations) using multiple representations (graphs + text)
Learners can demonstrate data interpretation processes step-by-step based on visual materials created with digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
